alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 11:41PM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting over 70 mph near and above treeline early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult if not impossible due to blowing and drifting snow significantly reducing visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
